channel.title: Ice Barrage broken ((CANNOT FIGURE IT OUT!))

item.title: Ice Barrage broken ((CANNOT FIGURE IT OUT!))
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121
item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

Hello, I got a weird problem, and i cannot figure it out.
Here is my barrage:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

I found another spell with the same ID as the barrage, it was the ice blitz, i changed it back but it still doesn’t works.
There aren’t any replica’s of this ice barrage in my client.java, and there aren’t any spells with the same ID as the barrage.
Oh, and when i don’t have the runes to cast this spell, it doesn’t says “You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”

Thank u.

- Lool121.

Read full topic
item.source: Ice Barrage broken ((CANNOT FIGURE IT OUT!))
